QuestData.Title: Return to Morris
QuestData.Description: The bat master in Brill is Bat Handler Anette. If you have already met her, then I can give you a bat to fly back to her.$B$BOur bats will always fly to the Undercity, but to travel to more remote locales their rider must first visit the area and speak with its bat master.$B$BYou have met Anette in Brill, so you may now fly bats there. Speak with me again when you are ready.
QuestData.LogDescription: Buy a bat ride to Brill from the bat master Michael Garrett, then bring Gordon's Crate to Deathguard Morris in Brill.
QuestData.CompletionText: $N, you return. Do you have our supplies from the Undercity?
QuestData.RewardText: Good work, $N. These weapons will ensure our Deathguards don't get caught unprepared.$B$BYou have done a valuable service for our Dark Lady.
